ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Dark Elves and Luclin
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Well, I went there and it looks like a whip but it s a bridle. The lowest end are the brown and tan rope bridles. The highest end I saw were the black and
ygData.messageBody:
> You actually buy a whip that summons the horse. The whips are named for
> color of horse, and apparently for speed, but the names didn't make sense
> to me. They're sold by a normal merchant, and boy, do you REALLY see how
> faction/charisma changes the price!
>
Well, I went there and it looks like a whip but it's a bridle. The lowest
end are the brown and tan rope bridles. The highest end I saw were the black
and white chain bridles. The chain ones went for about 117,000pp (to my wood
elf druid). The silk bridles ran about 78,000pp. I want to take my bard with
her charisma gear. The tan and brown silk ones were around 75,000. So i
guess they figured the black ones and white ones were more sought after. I
just wish they had other colors. I think it would be cool to have a pinto.
Or a red horse like the one my sister has in rl. Or a gray one like the
horse I got for my b-day one year.
too bad it would be too complicated to give the horses personalities.
luv,
-Su
